<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsectionxcoff/#a3ac4f56598f75c6b5d49836c11e061ed">isCsect</a>() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsectionxcoff/#af79b6732b23bd4070d16bc96bfbdbb15">getCSectType</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/xcoff/#ae6213556e13de39091f6861f199d7b1fa533de1d99e6b391e90e30a38b9e3a954">XCOFF::XTY&#95;CM</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsectionxcoff/#a8143019360c426d2ad94cfa1f0d4dab3">getMappingClass</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/xcoff/#abf0ae26de1e332dddf7d1383bb68502ca54b665a90facd18af1df67a6cf1194d5">XCOFF::XMC&#95;RW</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsectionxcoff/#a8143019360c426d2ad94cfa1f0d4dab3">getMappingClass</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/xcoff/#abf0ae26de1e332dddf7d1383bb68502cadc9c6c9efab40595101d1c98cb7bb4de">XCOFF::XMC&#95;BS</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsectionxcoff/#a8143019360c426d2ad94cfa1f0d4dab3">getMappingClass</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/xcoff/#abf0ae26de1e332dddf7d1383bb68502cab35fc11d2968b541a2442c6138a1ba09">XCOFF::XMC&#95;UL</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Generated a storage-mapping class for a common/bss/tbss csect we &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;don&#39;t &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;understand how to switch to.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Common symbols and local zero-initialized symbols for TLS and Non-TLS are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// eligible for .bss/.tbss csect, getKind().isThreadBSS() is used to cover</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TLS common and zero-initialized local symbols since linkage type (in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GlobalVariable) is not accessible in this class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsectionxcoff/#a7f037f6746d5c290f05b3e6505b52585">getKind</a>().isBSSLocal() || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsectionxcoff/#a7f037f6746d5c290f05b3e6505b52585">getKind</a>().isCommon() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsectionxcoff/#a7f037f6746d5c290f05b3e6505b52585">getKind</a>().isThreadBSS()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;wrong symbol type for .bss/.tbss csect&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t have to print a directive for switching to section for commons and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// zero-initialized TLS data. The &#39;.comm&#39; and &#39;.lcomm&#39; directives of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// variable will create the needed csect.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Zero-initialized TLS data with weak or external linkage are not eligible to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be put into common csect.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsectionxcoff/#a7f037f6746d5c290f05b3e6505b52585">getKind</a>().isThreadBSS()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    printCsectDirective(OS);</span></CodeLine>
